birth_place.zh-cn: 湖北省黄冈专区大冶县茗山乡彭晚村
birth_place.en: Pengwan Village, Mingshan Township, Daye County, Huanggang Prefecture, Hubei Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。曾任中共四川省委书记、中共广西壮族自治区党委书记、香港中联办主任等职，现任第十四届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and the Communist Party of China, currently a sub-national leader. He has served as Party Secretary of Sichuan, Party Secretary of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, and Director of the Hong Kong Liaison Office. He is currently a Vice Chairperson of the 14th National People's Congress Standing Committee.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently the Chairman of the 14th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党四川省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党四川省委员会
en: Sichuan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在四川省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，彭清华的前任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Peng Qinghua's predecessor as the Party Secretary of Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，彭清华的继任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Peng Qinghua's successor as the Party Secretary of Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 四川省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 四川省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Sichuan Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 四川省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Sichuan Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会
中共广西壮族自治区党委
en: Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广西壮族自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，彭清华的前任中共广西壮族自治区党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Peng Qinghua's predecessor as the Party Secretary of Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，彭清华的继任中共广西壮族自治区党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Peng Qinghua's successor as the Party Secretary of Guangxi.

nodes.id: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会
广西壮族自治区人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the People's Congress of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室

zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室
en: Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府在香港特别行政区的代表机构。
description.en: The representative office of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，彭清华的前任香港中联办主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Peng Qinghua's predecessor as Director of the Hong Kong Liaison Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，彭清华的继任香港中联办主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Peng Qinghua's successor as Director of the Hong Kong Liaison Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。彭清华在香港中联办任职期间，温家宝担任总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. Wen Jiabao was the premier during Peng Qinghua's tenure at the Hong Kong Liaison Office.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所高等教育机构。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省长沙市的一所高等教育机构。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Changsha, Hunan, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省广州市的一所高等教育机构。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Guangzhou, Guangdong, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责党组织和干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for party organization and cadre work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前高级领导人，曾任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Former senior leader of the Communist Party of China, once served as the head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, once served as the head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中共中央香港工作委员会

zh-cn: 中共中央香港工作委员会
en: Hong Kong Work Committee of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在香港的派出机构，与中央政府驻港联络办公室为一个机构两块牌子。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the CPC in Hong Kong, which operates under the principle of 'one institution, two names' with the Hong Kong Liaison Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在中国广西壮族自治区的军事机构。
description.en: The military organization of the People's Liberation Army in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在彭清华担任中共广西壮族自治区党委书记期间任自治区政府主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Chairman of the Guangxi Autonomous Region Government during Peng Qinghua's tenure as Party Secretary of the region.

nodes.id: 班禅额尔德尼·确吉杰布

zh-cn: 班禅额尔德尼·确吉杰布

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派第十一世班禅额尔德尼。
description.en: The 11th Panchen Erdini of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任四川省政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the Sichuan Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会农业与农村委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会农业与农村委员会
en: Agriculture and Rural Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖北省的一个旧县名，现为县级市大冶市。
description.en: A former county in Hubei Province, China, now the county-level city of Daye.

description.zh-cn: 彭清华出生于湖北省黄冈专区大冶县茗山乡彭晚村。
description.en: Peng Qinghua was born in Pengwan Village, Mingshan Township, Daye County, Huanggang Prefecture, Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 彭清华于1976年6月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Peng Qinghua joined the Communist Party of China in June 1976.

description.zh-cn: 1979年至1983年，彭清华在北京大学哲学系学习。
description.en: From 1979 to 1983, Peng Qinghua studied in the Department of Philosophy at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 1993年至1996年，彭清华在湖南大学工业外贸专业在职研究生学习，获工学硕士学位。
description.en: From 1993 to 1996, Peng Qinghua pursued postgraduate studies in Industrial and Foreign Trade at Hunan University on an in-service basis, obtaining a Master's degree in Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 1996年至2001年，彭清华在中山大学企业管理专业在职研究生学习，获管理学博士学位。
description.en: From 1996 to 2001, Peng Qinghua pursued postgraduate studies in Business Administration at Sun Yat-sen University on an in-service basis, obtaining a PhD in Management.

position.zh-cn: 干事、副处长、秘书、党建研究所副所长、研究室主任、政策法规局局长、部务委员兼干部一局局长
position.en: Official, Deputy Division Chief, Secretary, Deputy Director of the Party Building Research Institute, Director of the Research Office, Director of the Policy and Regulation Bureau, Member of the Departmental Affairs Committee and Director of the First Cadre Bureau

description.zh-cn: 彭清华自1983年从北京大学毕业后被分配到中共中央组织部工作，直至2003年调任香港中联办。
description.en: After graduating from Peking University in 1983, Peng Qinghua was assigned to work at the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee until he was transferred to the Hong Kong Liaison Office in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 彭清华曾担任时任中共中央组织部部长宋平的秘书。
description.en: Peng Qinghua served as the secretary to Song Ping, who was then the head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 彭清华曾担任时任中共中央组织部部长吕枫的秘书。
description.en: Peng Qinghua served as the secretary to Lü Feng, who was then the head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室

position.zh-cn: 副主任、正部长级副主任、主任
position.en: Deputy Director, Deputy Director at Ministerial Level, Director

description.zh-cn: 彭清华于2003年12月调任香港中联办副主任，后升任主任。
description.en: Peng Qinghua was transferred to the Hong Kong Liaison Office as Deputy Director in December 2003 and was later promoted to Director.

relationships.target: 中共中央香港工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 2007年7月，彭清华接替高祀仁担任中央香港工作委员会书记。
description.en: In July 2007, Peng Qinghua succeeded Gao Siren as Secretary of the Central Hong Kong Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 彭清华接替高祀仁的中央香港工作委员会书记职务，并在2009年5月接替其香港中联办主任职务。
description.en: Peng Qinghua succeeded Gao Siren as Secretary of the Central Hong Kong Work Committee in July 2007 and as Director of the Hong Kong Liaison Office in May 2009.

description.zh-cn: 张晓明接替彭清华的香港中联办主任职务。
description.en: Zhang Xiaoming succeeded Peng Qinghua as Director of the Hong Kong Liaison Office.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 彭清华于2012年12月至2018年3月担任中共广西壮族自治区党委书记。
description.en: Peng Qinghua served as the Party Secretary of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region from December 2012 to March 2018.

description.zh-cn: 彭清华接替郭声琨的中共广西壮族自治区党委书记职务。
description.en: Peng Qinghua succeeded Guo Shengkun as the Party Secretary of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

relationships.target: 广西壮族自治区人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 彭清华于2013年1月当选为广西壮族自治区人大常委会主任。
description.en: Peng Qinghua was elected Director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region in January 2013.

position.en: First Secretary of the Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 彭清华于2013年5月起担任广西军区党委第一书记。
description.en: Peng Qinghua has served as the First Secretary of the Party Committee of the Guangxi Military District since May 2013.

description.zh-cn: 2017年4月，时任中共中央总书记习近平到广西考察，彭清华陪同并汇报工作。
description.en: In April 2017, Xi Jinping, then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, inspected Guangxi. Peng Qinghua accompanied him and reported on his work.

position.en: Deputy Secretary and Chairman of the Government

description.zh-cn: 在彭清华担任中共广西壮族自治区党委书记期间，陈武是其副手，担任副书记兼政府主席。
description.en: During Peng Qinghua's tenure as Party Secretary of Guangxi, Chen Wu was his deputy, serving as Deputy Secretary and Chairman of the Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党四川省委员会

description.zh-cn: 彭清华于2018年3月至2022年4月担任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Peng Qinghua served as the Party Secretary of Sichuan from March 2018 to April 2022.

description.zh-cn: 彭清华接替王东明转任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Peng Qinghua succeeded Wang Dongming as the Party Secretary of Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 王晓晖接替彭清华的中共四川省委书记职务。
description.en: Wang Xiaohui succeeded Peng Qinghua as the Party Secretary of Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 鹿心社接替彭清华的中共广西壮族自治区党委书记职务。
description.en: Lu Xinshe succeeded Peng Qinghua as Party Secretary of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

relationships.target: 四川省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 彭清华于2019年1月当选为四川省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Peng Qinghua was elected Director of the Standing Committee of the Sichuan Provincial People's Congress in January 2019.

relationships.target: 班禅额尔德尼·确吉杰布

description.zh-cn: 2021年7月，时任四川省委书记彭清华在成都会见班禅额尔德尼·确吉杰布。
description.en: In July 2021, Peng Qinghua, then Party Secretary of Sichuan, met with Bainqen Erdini Qoigyijab in Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 2021年7月，时任四川省委书记彭清华与四川省政协主席柯尊平一同会见班禅额尔德尼·确吉杰布。
description.en: In July 2021, Peng Qinghua, then Party Secretary of Sichuan, and Ke Zunping, Chairman of the Sichuan Provincial CPPCC, jointly met with Bainqen Erdini Qoigyijab.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会农业与农村委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年6月24日，彭清华被任命为全国人大农业与农村委员会副主任委员。
description.en: On June 24, 2022, Peng Qinghua was appointed Vice Chairperson of the Agriculture and Rural Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月10日，彭清华当选为第十四届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: On March 10, 2023, Peng Qinghua was elected as a Vice Chairperson of the 14th National People's Congress Standing Committee.

position.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会副委员长
position.en: Vice Chairperson of the NPC Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 彭清华担任全国人大常委会副委员长，直接向委员长赵乐际负责。
description.en: As a Vice Chairperson of the NPC Standing Committee, Peng Qinghua reports directly to Chairman Zhao Leji.
